entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 21.
